"We have a problem," said the President. Her aides were quick to find a solution. Was it a coordinated plan to isolate the United States? Was it a terrorist plot? Or was it just a simple misunderstanding. 

The aides reported back to the president with their report. Their reactivated satellites that were dormant for 50 years revealed no movement nor any other human activity visible in the other parts of the world.

"They just left, Ms. President," said one of the aides. "We've tracked a spaceship heading towards Mars. The last people on earth left 10 hours ago."

Astonished, the President said, "Well, welcome to the United States of Earth."
